caption: We enjoyed this spot, its a restaurant/club in the middle of downtown Charlotte. Nice!!
Good music and food...happy people...
Cool bar especially for hangover food 😉...
Love the ambiance
So good! Definitely stop here’

Went in and automatically had a great time. Mark and Gabby were behind the bar, and they created such a fun environment. They ask if you have a mask when you walk in and that’s great, understanding COVID. Personal opinion is to not go out if you are worried about it. Great dive bar, just what I was looking for
This are starting to feel normal again.
Cool spot great food awesome staff.

Didn't know what to think at first... there is no sign that says seat yourself and no one greeted us. After 5 minutes one of the bartenders came around to where we where sitting and greeted us...... she was nice but brought out dirty menus. …
Best place to go to if your UPTOWN... Vibez, Food, Great Music, and The Best Bartenders!
Really enjoyed it!!
Definitely a local place which provided a fun atmosphere

Pre-covid good place for a decent priced beer and drink...   But now stay away, absolutely no covid protections for staff, management or customers were visible. At least they have two on-street benches.  Too many people allowed, hard to reach bartenders, just give it a pass for now.
We walked in and no one was wearing a mask, including the waitress. We walked back out.
Great environment great people great food.  Awesome location!!

I wanted to give this place a chance but was very put off. Staff not wearing masks and not requiring patrons to wear them either. ZERO social distancing going on. Also doesn't look like the staff is properly cleaning/sanitizing in between each guest. If you care about your families health and safety, I DO NOT recommend you go here!
Nice place location music staff and customer are one family
The girls are amazing!!
Greatest Giants bar Uptown!
NY Giants bar for games on Sundays. Friendly staff! Just need to fix main screen so the picture fits properly. A couple Giants wins would help lol
Kat is a fantastic bartender. 10/10 would recommend.
Nice atmosphere and good vibes!
Nice chill spot

The Local has my heart everytime I go to Boone! The nachos alone can make you want to go twice in a day if you are on vacation! I recommend also to try their Cuban. The Cuban is made with Naan bread which I was little skeptical at first but …
Very good.
Kat is great! And she is very nice and wants to know your name, because everything she does is classy and personalized! Tell her MJ sent you

AN EMPLOYEE STOLE MONEY OFF OF MY CARD. I went to the local on July 12 at about 2:15pm and stayed for a few hours, paid my bill with a card and left. On July 15, I noticed on my bank statement The Local swiped my card for more than what was …
One of my favorite bars in uptown!!!! The Buffalo bill pasta bowl is my favorite

I went to see my friend while she was training to be a bartender here. I tipped her very well and so did all of our friends. She made an agreement with the Manager Dustin to get her tips for the night which is why I tipped well for her. At the end of the night she didn’t not receive any money even though she worked a lot of people.

I'm visiting from out of town. Google mistakenly lists this place as a brewery, which is what I was expecting. The low rating here is entirely about not meeting that expectation; the beer selection is mediocre and no local options, even.
My new favorite after work spot in Uptown Charlotte. Food is great and service is amazing!  Both Gabby and Amanda were top notch even during a sudden rush!!  I will definitely be back!!!

I took clients here today on a business lunch and both the food and service were literally atrocious. I was embarrassed. They claimed to be out of onions, peppers, mushrooms, bacon, and eggs. I miss the good old Phil’s Deli days!

I went on a Tuesday evening during the bar bingo. I thought this will be fun. No no no. Service was horrible n the food was worse. I tried to order nachos which was on the menu. They don't serve nachos, they have tatchos. Ok that sounds …

The Local is another one of the tiny clusters of bars along Tryon Street in Uptown Charlotte that have a massive crowd.  Well into the late hours of the night you can see crowds pouring out of these bars.  I met a staff member from this bar and she was a wonderful human being.

Might come to late night drink but the atmosphere isn't really dining conducive.  Wouldn't order the pickle chips again, very greasy and not so tasty.  Beer was fine, BBQ sliders we're good and waitress was friendly and adequate. Smelled …
Horrible service and overpriced
Gabby provides great customer service. Very attentive and helpful. Will return soon!!
Really great place, love both the Gaby’s (Gabies?). They know how to treat customers.
Gabby the waitress and Gabby the server are both beautiful and lovely. Future wives. Great bar.
Gabby was awesome! Fast service, great burger, good local beers on tap. Definitely worth a try
The service is great, both of the Gabby’s were awesome! Order the Buffalo Chicken sandwich

Fantastic bar to watch the game or just to have a few drinks.  Wife and I went there on our night out because the other bar around the corner was full at 7:30.  They had several games on and as others have said, Gabby was great.  Doesn't …
Stopped in for a beer after work , had no idea I was going to be charged $7.56 for a draft copper , no t sure why it was priced like this but I won't be returning

Great Food!!! Great Entertainment! BUT, the staff are VERY Non ATTENTIVE (to say the least)  I had been there several times before and as usual it took a while to place my order, even when there were only a couple of people at the bar. This …
Just guess I am not cool enough to get get decent service!! Or, maybe my waitress has a hearing disorder! I think it is cool they hire handicapped workers
Gabby (Gabbi?) Friggin rules. Great spot. Will definitely return.

Who has the best trivia? Local has the best trivia! These girls killed it, Sara, Gabby and Briana handled the crowd like pros. It was a great turn out, definitely don't miss out next week! Make sure you call and reserve a table, room fills up quickly!
Has the best Taco Tuesday in town. I almost always have meat of some sort in my tacos but this place has amazing veggie tacos too.
The didn't have most of the drinks I like to drink.. after the third attempt they had it..they also didn't have straws.  The DJ was good .
Average
Perfect little dive
Wasnt impressed with the service or the food, the Mac n cheese was dry and hard to eat. Hopefully it was just an off day
Bartender was fast and furious😂 Nice selection of beers and spirits
Great cost on drinks. Great service. Ive been here about 3 times.
I had the pork sliders while waiting to begin my live acoustic set. I was rather impressed with them. Good stuff.
Vegan burger is the best

First time trying and hands down the tacos and side of Mac are great! I picked three tacos 1. Spicy buffalo, 2. Chicken and 3. Steak. My three selections were the the bomb with the exception that I must Warn the buffalo shrimp is moderately spicy. If you want takeout they also partner with GrubHub for delivery.
Good prices. Good service.  Only complaint: This place has a touch tunes jukebox and plays their own sound track. Would have been nice to know.
Overall a good Taco Tuesday experience. One of our party was brought the wrong food and it was still wrong on his bill but the waitress corrected it.
Great local place worth good beer specials and great wait staff. Excellent lunch options and overall a pleasant experience in uptown Charlotte.

Food quality is inconsistent. Some apps are decent, most items are meh, some items are really gross. I don't know why I keep going back.  The place also smells like bathroom cleaner.  Servers are nice.
Cold beer and hot babes. The girls here are straight up supermodels. The food is just a bonus. If there was a president of this fine establishment, it would be Babe-raham Lincoln.
Great for lunch, great atmosphere.. would highly recommend
Staff was very pleasant and helpful.  Steak sandwich was poor quality. Looks like a good place for a drink.
This is my spot!  Every other week!

We’ve been regulars at Thursday night trivia for a year, but recently The Local has started allowing giant parties of 20 to reserve tables for Thursday happy hour and trivia. I called at 11am when The Local opened to reserve our table for 4 …

This hole in the wall dive bar (the good kind) is an oasis in an otherwise franchise-heavy downtown Charlotte. Waitress was genuinely friendly and chatty. Dart boards and an array of mules made a memorable, welcome escape from a day of …

My favorite lunch spot uptown hands down. Daily specials for tacos, burgers, chicken sandwiches, wings and entertaining trivia every Wednesday. The service is 10/10, the atmosphere is perfect for a relaxing day drink/lunch and its a great spot to grab a drink at night.
This place is great.  Came after a ball game super inviting great beer and burger
Good service and great taco tuesday deal. The tortilla chips and ranch were strange though....

This place is a favorite for me and my coworkers.  With daily specials for $5 or less, u cant go wrong with this place. Not to mention the food is DELICIOUS!  You must try the sweet potato tots! Simply amazing.

I love this establishment.  Great food, atmosphere and staff.  I've been there a number of times when the bar is packed and I still am able to get a drink pretty quickly compared to every other busy bar in Charlotte.

Worst place I've ever been to. I paid $25 for my friends and I to get into. We waited over 20 minutes to get a drink and it was so hot and disgusting in there. The bouncer at the door was rude and would not give us our money back even …
Great food and atmosphere

Terrible and if I could give zero stars then I absolutely would. Imagine walking up to a bar where you have just witnessed several people of a lighter skin tone, enter in a jolly yet happy mood, then once you and your party walk up (dressed …
Excellent service, great beer selection, good burgers, and they have some really nifty mixed drinks too. Will return
Good specials, good food,
This little dive has the best tacos in the area. Full bar and good beer selection. Such a cool hideaway!
Divey vibe, good music, affordable drinks
This was the tiniest of the bars I'd been into on this block. The hip-hop DJ was good but I felt claustrophobic most of the time.
Closest thing to a local dive bar that is in Uptown Charlotte.
Drinks aren't very good, for the location I was hoping for something better.
Delicious food (Burger and Salad), choice of local beers. Nice staff and good music playing. Our 6 month old son also liked it :)
Food was delicious. Had the Philly style Mac n cheese bowl, my GF had the Buffalo style bowl. We both preferred the Philly style. The Mac N cheese bites are a must have!
Another hidden gem in uptown Charlotte. Great place for lunch that is surprisingly inexpensive ($5 daily specials and $8-12 regular meals). Love the old pub atmosphere and high-top tables.
I must say so far so GOOD and Staff is wonderful as well
Love this bar, good food, good people and good prices.
I LOVE THIS PLACE! The staff is super nice, great personalities, quick with the drinks, and the food is GREAT! Definitely a great friendly environment to hang out with friends on the weekend!
Have a $5 deal almost every day for lunch. Must try!
Favorite place for taco Tuesdays, the tacos are amazing, also have them in steak,chicken, beef, veggie. Good specials everyday of the week, pretty good music. Very friendly staff.
15 minutes sat down, not even a menu or welcome. Get more servers on Sunday if you're promoting Sunday football.
The food never disappointed me

I was in there the other night with my friends and we were treated poorly by the staff.  There were only five other customers in the bar at this time.  All of them seemed pissed off to be working there and messed up our order.  The guy …
They messed my order up and lied about it, seems like this has happened before. Too bad, I wanted to like the place.
$2 tacos are absolutely amazing. Definitely get the steak tacos.
